name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Sales Engineer with 8 years of experience in cloud infrastructure and enterprise monitoring solutions across diverse sectors, particularly healthcare and finance. Proficient in delivering effective event management strategies utilizing tools like **AWS**, **Azure**, **GCP**, **Nagios**, **Datadog**, and **Splunk**. Skilled in SaaS product deployment and support, coupled with strong communication and presentation abilities.

Demonstrated expertise in full-stack development, utilizing **Python**, **JavaScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js** to build robust applications. Building solutions on modern web technologies, with a solid understanding of microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and network systems. I have a proven track record in compliance adherence, with a keen focus on standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Notable experience collaborating with technical teams and stakeholders to integrate innovative features and optimize enterprise-grade platforms.
